title: Atta Tarar visits Mumtaz media office
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 04 (APP):Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar on Wednesday visited the office of Mumtaz Media Group to discuss matters related to the media sector.
CEO of Mumtaz Media Group, Ahsan Tariq accorded a warm welcome to the minister on arrival at the office.
He also met with Editor of Daily Mumtaz, Tariq Mehmood Sameer and condoled with him on the demise of his brother-in-law, Muhammad Aslam.
The minister offered Fateha for the departed soul and prayed to the Almighty to grant him highest ranks in Jannah.
On this occasion, Atta Tarar also visited associated departments of Mumtaz Media Group.
He was accompanied by Principal Information Officer Mubashir Hasan.
The minister met with the staff and extended his best wishes for Mumtaz Media Group.
Attaullah Tarar stated that the role of Mumtaz Media Group and other media outlets during the recent Indo-Pak standoff was commendable.
